title: DeviantArt - The Largest Online Art Gallery and Community
text: Home Explore Team Updates Tips are now available at checkout! Sellers, you can now receive tips directly from your fans when they purchase Premium Downloads, Premium Galleries, or Exclusives. Buyers can pick a preset amount or add their own, making it easier than ever to show appreciation and support your work. Your Earnings page has moved to Studio! Nothing is gone: all your tools and data remain the same. You’ll just be viewing your earnings in a new, streamlined location with a sleeker look. Don’t worry, you can still access Earnings from the Profile dropdown menu. Go ahead and check out the updated look! Great news, selling at scale just got easier! You can now bulk-sell items directly from all Studio tabs: Drafts, Tools (Draw, DreamUp, Wixel), and Sta.sh tabs, not only from Published. This update streamlines your workflow, saves time, and helps you publish more with fewer steps. Try it out now! Your Galleries are now easier to navigate! A few light design updates to how galleries and sub-galleries display on your Profile make it easier for you and your fans to navigate and explore your work. What’s new: The updated layout puts more focus on your art by reducing empty space and making navigation more intuitive. Galleries and sub-galleries together. Sub-galleries now appear in the same carousel as regular galleries. When you open a gallery, its sub-galleries appear alongside it, with a back button to the parent gallery. This brings your art higher on the page, so viewers can easily discover and enjoy it! Cleaner gallery thumbnails. Thumbnails now put more emphasis on your images (your art!), with less wasted space and slightly tighter margins and padding. (Before vs. after) Check out your updated Gallery tab on Profile and share your thoughts in the comments below! Note: This update is rolling out gradually, so you might not see it yet.
